We are Extinction Rebellion Oxford and we are your neighbours, your colleagues, your relatives, and your friends.

We carry out peaceful, joyful, direct action against Government inaction on climate and ecological catastrophe â€“ ongoing crises that will devastate all of us in the UK through more floods, lethal storms, heatwaves, and droughts.

Following the Principles and Values of Extinction Rebellion, we work with what we have: our bodies, our minds and our hearts.
